item.title: Bond investors brace for US slowdown, shed risk as Fed seen on hold
item.author: EBR European Business Report
item.description:

Extreme net long positioning in Treasuries -J.P. Morgan

US rate futures price in 62 bps of cutrs this year

Focus on quantiative tightening, 'dot plot'
By Gertrude Chavez-Dreyfuss
NEW YORK, March 18 (Reuters) - Bond investors are bracing for a U.S. economic downturn, as they pare back ri...
